content:
Diagnosis:		Gastric adenocarcinoma, intestinal type

Management:		Total gastrectomy March 2023
		Adjuvant CAPOX completed September 2023

Histology:		pT3N1M0, HER2 equivocal (2+) FISH negative

Current Situation:	Routine surveillance review

[redacted name] attended clinic today for routine follow-up. She has recovered well from her adjuvant chemotherapy which completed 6 months ago. Her appetite has improved and weight has stabilized at 62kg. She reports occasional early satiety but manages small frequent meals well. No concerning symptoms. Blood tests show stable parameters with CEA 2.4. Latest surveillance CT thorax/abdomen/pelvis from 15/3/24 shows no evidence of recurrence. Plan is to continue 3-monthly follow-up with next CT scan due in 3 months time.

cancer_timeline.value: CT thorax/abdomen/pelvis shows no evidence of recurrence

patient_facts.value: occasional early satiety, manages with small frequent meals

status_updates.value: Post-operative gastric cancer patient completed adjuvant chemotherapy. Currently well with no evidence of recurrence on surveillance.
No evidence of recurrence on latest imaging
